Today, on the anniversary of the attack on #PearlHarbor, we pay special tribute to the thousands of Americans who lost their lives on that infamous day. And we thank every member of that greatest generation who bravely took on the forces or tyranny and won. You inspire us all!

I believe we made Dr. King proud today.
